ComicInfo.Title: Snake Hunt Part 8
ComicInfo.Series: G.I. Joe: A Real American Hero
ComicInfo.Summary:
“SNAKE HUNT,” Part 8. Cobra Commander wants a Snake Eyes of his own. The Joes have other ideas. It’ll take two armies to settle this dispute! It’s all hands on deck for both G.I. JOE and Cobra as living legend Larry Hama and fan-favorite artist Robert Atkins continue this massive 10-issue event… featuring EVERY SINGLE MEMBER OF G.I. JOE! There’s no halftime break in this contest, folks! All action, all the time!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Robert Atkins (a) & Tom B. Long (c) | 1-2 | B | Cover B | Jamie Sullivan (a), Jesse Heagy (c) & Audrey Sullivan (c) | 3 | RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive Variant Cover | John Royle (a), Jagdish Kumar (a) & James Offredi (c) | 4 | RE | East Side Comics Exclusive Variant Cover (Baroness Black Dress) | Mike Mayhew | 5 | RE | East Side Comics Exclusive Variant Cover (Baroness White Suit) | Mike Mayhew | 6 |
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-12 19:21:28. [CVDB788961]
